revised_title: Energy and Force in Isometric Muscle Contractions
tldr: The author investigates the relationship between force developed and energy liberated in an isometric twitch, finding that the ratio P/IJH is nearly constant over a wide range of muscle lengths. The author also discusses the importance of minimizing compliance in the recording equipment to obtain accurate measurements and suggests that the ultimate value of P/IJH would be around 13 if compliance from the muscle itself, tendons, and other factors could be eliminated.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Muscle Physiology
